reviews.sentence: Excellent Hotel. This hotel is really excellent in terms of location room comfort and facilities.
Graduation. Wonderful stay staff very friendly enjoyed coffee and cookies in the lobby upon check in.

Thrilled. Love the new TVs in the lobby. Fantastic customer service and great dinner as well. We plan on staying here much more often and enjoying another football game at night. Overall great hotel that we enjoy coming to on a regular basis and recommend frequently. Thanks for your attention to detail.

Great location nice hotel. We picked the Hilton garden hotel through Thomas cook as part of our package because the hotel looked great and very good location and we knew the group of Hilton in UK are generally good we was not disappointed on arrival a warm welcome and lovely room with 2 large beds en suite with all the usual free toiletries good quality nutrogena ones replaced daily with bath and over bath power shower with large and small towels replaced daily. The room had a good panasonic telly large wardrobe ironing board and iron with a safe in the wardrobe free and a small fridge. The hotel had a nice pool and spa tub to the side the pool warm from the sun and the spa heated. It does have restaurant and bar which we did not use so can not comment. A guest room with free internet access computers. The hotel is close to all disney parks 5 mins away seaworld 5 mins and restaurants and bars within minutes drive. Orlando airport is probably about half an hour by car down the I 4 motorway. I would highly recommend this hotel for people who want to visit the disney parks and the night life in the area is better than Kissimmee in my opinion from past experience.

Very good. Very warm welcome service from front desk. Very clean romAnd easy access to laundry room. Front lobby has drinks. The best Hilton ever. We will come back again. Rate is very reasonable. Houskerping is great.

Staff friendly and rooms clean. The staff at this hotel are very friendly and helpful. The room I had was clean and all of the amenities was as described. I took one star off because of issues with the food services. On Friday evening I happened to be the first to the restaurant. They were already out of the soup of the day they only serve breakfast and dinner. The soup of the day was finished the day before can not make this up. I did manage to grab one of the last burgers. Waitress was embarrassed but did a great job providing service. Like I mentioned the staff is fine. The breakfast was a great deal. For 1060 inclusive of tax you can have an omelet bacon and eggs fresh toast or bagels and fruit. Nice portions. Recommend you try if you canAl in all a family friendly location. I did notice that most of the front desk staff were bilingual. They spoke both English and Spanish.

Hilton Garden Inn Lake Buena Vista Fla. Excellent breakfast service staff and food. Staff very helpful. Clean nice lobby. Room clean. Would recommend this hotel. It was a little difficult to get to the Disney parks. Shuttle service was available but times were not conficent.

Family trip. Staff was very friendly look of facility was very good cleanliness of room was excellent. Would have been nice if shuttle bus to Universal Studios ran later than 6 pm since we were attending Halloween Horror nights and the park was open late.

Great location and price. Great reception team. But staff in the restaurant area most unwelcoming bunch ever seen. They treat very bad. Will return only if I can avoid to eat at their restaurant. Definitely must avoid of travelling with family.

Aces all around. I do not believe there is a better hotel chain with the value of Hilton. The rooms beds amenities etc are fantastic. The ap is a terrific tool which gives you peace of mind too knowing you will always locate a great place to stay. Hilton is an absolute must whenever and wherever we go.

Good and restful stay. Overall decent hotel at a good price. Room had necessary amenities like a refrigerator TV with digital channels comfortable bed and roomy. Did not have a tub in my room but instead a shower stall. The door was placed so you had to reach in from the rear to turn on the shower and get wet with the initial cold blast. The lamps are a bit outdated and my bedside one had a faulty on off switch so I did not use. Exercise room was nice with a decent variety of machines but the treadmills need repair along with consoles led lights burnt out. Breakfast was very good but not complimentary. Parking was free. Overall it was a good stay at a very fair price. Update the lamps and fix the exercise equipment and it would be excellent.

Clean and comfortable. I have stayed at this hotel several times. it is clean and the bed is comfortable. I only stay here when I can get a rate below 100 because it is good but it is nothing special. Staff was not very friendly. They woke us each morning before 7AM moving carts and talking very loudly in the hallway. Bathroom has no exhaust fan which is tolerable but it should have one and I dislike that it does not.

The elevator dropped a flight and I reported it to the front desk three times. They did nothing to fix it and said they would tell maintenance. My daughter and I walked 6 flights of stairs multiple times a day. Hotelscom and Hilton have not responded to complaints.

Fawlty Towers. if you want to see the real Fawlty towers this is the hotel for you. The staff openly argued with each other. The chef left in the middle of the serving. They did not restack food och drinks during the whole week. The elevators has passed the inspection date with 10 month. the list goes on. So if you want a reality show you can enjoy it form the bar. The bar staff was very helful.

Great hotel. This hotel is in a great location close to an Outlet Mall as well as several Disney attractions and restaurants. It was very clean. The staff was very welcoming and friendly. The restaurant is convenient and worked out well for us as an option when we did not want to eat out. Limited area for a daily walk outside due to no sidewalks and it is on a busy street. But there is a nice workout indoor facility and an outdoor pool for warmer weather.

place was clean and serviceable. the restaurant is very limited. breakfast is about 10. Free coffee in room and in lobby good flavor and strong enoughcould not get wifi to work. had a happy hour but only had limited selection of beer all in bottles. Overall ok not impressive.

Remodeled HGI. it is fine my room had small details regarding maintenance and we found an elevator with our floor button damaged so we had to go up to our room only in one of the 2 elevators available.

Hands down is the worst Hilton property I have stayed at. Downright disgusting. Nothing works properly ac unit had to be changed out in my room due to the banging sounds it made. internet did not work at all for over 24 hours nasty moldy bathrooms all sorts of gross stuff on the walls and to top it off the staff does n’t really care about any of this. Spoke with two different managers about these concerns after getting attitude from the young girls at the front desk neither seemed to want to help at all. At 9 am starts the slamming of the entry doors by the housekeepers and it continues to well past 1 pm this could be fixed by adjusting the setting on the door closing device but instead they all slam so hard you not only hear it down the hall but can feel the pressure difference in your room when a door slams.

We did not have a good experience throughout our stay. Maid came in the room even though the do not disturb sign was on the door. Ignored me when she left the room as I was trying to use my key. Ice machine not working on our floor. We were hustled to sit down in the dining room while we were perusing the food selection. The waitress informed us that we had to pay for the continental breakfast. No coffee downstairs throughout the day. Lots of construction and strong chemical smell in the lobby. A construction worker rudely pushed past my boyfriend while we were waiting for the elevator. Business center under construction and inaccessible. Only one of three sinks in lobby bathroom worked. Upcharges for bottled water and breakfast free for gold club members only made it clear we are second rate even at a Garden Inn. Carpet in our room is sticky and has stains. On the positive side the room was quiet and the shower had hot water thus the one star.

Hotel Staff Great Hotel was under construction. Stayed here for 4 days. The hotel was under construction at the time so only our room and ballroom were open. Our room had been updated and was nice. The breakfast was good with lots of options and the staff was friendly and attentive in all aspects. The pool was nice and had shady areas if needed. Would recommend.
